name: Crystals of Ruin
description:
A game submission to Ryan L Spring jam with the theme "Connection".

Dive deep into the ancient ruins to collect the mystical crystals of ruin.

Avoid falling on spikes, getting hit by blocks and eaten by monsters.

The catch?

You must connect the path for our hero using tetraminoes!

*** The game is not really finished. It will be updated with an improved version when the jam ends ***
